mapper.select: SELECT REPLYNO, REPARENTNO, BOARDRETEXT, BOARDREDATE, BOARDREDELETE, ARTICLENO, ID, NICK, LEVEL FROM B_BOARDREPLY WHERE articleNO = #{articleNO} START WITH reParentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR replyNO=reParentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY replyNO ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT max(replyNO)+1 FROM B_BOARDREPLY
INSERT INTO B_BOARDREPLY (REPLYNO, REPARENTNO, BOARDRETEXT, BOARDREDATE, BOARDREDELETE, ARTICLENO, ID, NICK) VALUES(#{replyNO}, #{reParentNO}, #{boardReText}, sysdate, '', #{articleNO}, #{id}, #{nick})
mapper.update: UPDATE B_BOARDREPLY SET REPARENTNO=#{reParentNO}, BOARDRETEXT=#{boardReText}, BOARDREDATE=sysdate, BOARDREDELETE='', ARTICLENO=#{articleNO}, ID=#{id}, NICK=#{nick} WHERE REPLYNO=#{replyNO}
